content:
# I successfully harvested 10 Iron Ore, and my inventory now reflects this change. 
# Next, I need to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates, as I cannot craft items directly from the ore.

# I will place a Stone Furnace to begin the smelting process. 
# First, I need to ensure I have a Stone Furnace in my inventory. 
# If it's not there, I will craft one.

ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Ensure I have a Stone Furnace available.
furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Find a valid position to place the furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the furnace.
